messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], not more than 15 wire eating mammals have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Space Station 13. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Space Station 13. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
General Alert

What the fuck was that?!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Space Station 13. Brace for impact.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the full on syndicate invasion we are sending pulse weaponry to the medical virology area
